General.Name: United Microelectronics Corporation
General.Description: United Microelectronics Corporation operates as a semiconductor wafer foundry in Taiwan, Singapore, China, Hong Kong, Japan, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company provides circuit design, mask tooling, wafer fabrication, and assembly and testing services. It serves fabless design companies and integrated device manufacturers. The company was incorporated in 1980 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: Hsinchu Science Park, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30078

3.Name: Mr. Chi-Tung  Liu
3.Title: CFO, Sr. VP, Head of Corp. Governance & Company Sec.
